Package algorithms.imageProcessing.scaleSpace

Class ScaleSpaceCurve

java.lang.Object
algorithms.imageProcessing.scaleSpace.ScaleSpaceCurve
Direct Known Subclasses:
ScaleSpaceCurve2
public class ScaleSpaceCurve extends Object
Holds X(t, sigma), Y(t, sigma), k(t, sigma) and the array t where t is the point index in the closed curve it is on, normalized to values that range from [0, 1) (e.g. a closed curve w/ 10 points would have t[index]=[0, 0.1, 0.2, ...0.9]). Also holds information on inflection points (where the curvature is zero).
Author:
nichole
